title: Lyudmila Putina
summary: Lyudmila Aleksandrovna Ocheretnaya (Russian: Людмила Александровна Очеретная, pronounced [lʲʊdˈmʲilə ɐlʲɪkˈsandrəvnə ɐtɕɪˈrʲetnəjə]; née Shkrebneva (Шкребнева) and formerly Putina (Путина, pronounced [ˈputʲɪnə]); born 6 January 1958) is the former wife of Vladimir Putin, the current president and former prime minister of Russia.
